ygData.subject: RE: Dragon kit goodies (was:RE: Nagafen 2; Sylly 0)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve only gotten werewolf talons off the MM werewolves (and gypsies too).  They re used for the crafted breastplate quest, not the lupine claw gauntlets
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 13 Jan 2000, JasonF wrote:
>
> These drop in Castle Mistmoore at night when you're camping the Mistmoore
> Battle Drums. In a three hour camp we accumulated probably four or five
> werewolf claws.

I've only gotten werewolf talons off the MM werewolves (and
gypsies too). They're used for the crafted breastplate quest,
not the lupine claw gauntlets quest.

werewolf talon = crafted breastplate
werewolf claw = lupine claw gauntlets

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
